trans-unit.source:
• Your credit card or debit card will be used for monthly billing.
  • Your monthly billing cycle starts when you insert your first HP Instant Ink cartridge. Actual billing start date depends on whether you pre-paid for your first month or applied any promotions.
  • You can change or cancel your service anytime.

seg-source.mrk:
• Your credit card or debit card will be used for monthly billing.
  • Your monthly billing cycle starts when you insert your first HP Instant Ink cartridge.

Actual billing start date depends on whether you pre-paid for your first month or applied any promotions.
  • You can change or cancel your service anytime.
